Actions.Name: Valorous Strike
Effects: An ally in range 3 of a [name] gains 2 vigor, or 4 vigor if bloodied.

Actions.Name: Rally
Actions.Effects: Up to three allies adjacent to a [name] may dash 1 space, or one ally adjacent to a [name] may dash 3 spaces.

Actions.Name: Take Heart
Actions.Description: All allies adjacent to a [name] may end a status and gain 2 vigor, or 4 vigor if they are bloodied.
